data.headline: DevOps Engineer with Expertise in Enterprise Architecture
data.summary: Experienced DevOps Engineer with a strong background in enterprise architecture. Adept at designing and implementing scalable, secure, and efficient infrastructure solutions.

experience.title: DevOps Engineer
bullets: Designed and implemented a scalable, cloud-based infrastructure using AWS, Docker, and Kubernetes
Automated deployment pipelines for multiple applications, reducing deployment time by 80%
Implemented monitoring and observability solutions to proactively identify and resolve issues

experience.title: Enterprise Architect
bullets: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define and implement enterprise-wide architecture standards
Designed and documented the organization's technology roadmap, aligning IT initiatives with business goals
Conducted technology assessments and provided recommendations for modernization and optimization

projects.name: Cloud Migration Project
projects.description: Migrated the company's on-premises infrastructure to a hybrid cloud environment using AWS and Azure.

projects.name: Microservices Transformation
projects.description: Redesigned the company's monolithic application into a scalable, microservices-based architecture.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Smiling, well-groomed, and wearing a suit.
